title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app 45-A
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app 45-A
State Regulations
EXEMPT ACTIONS
The purpose of this Appendix is to classify actions or classes
of actions which the issuer has determined to be exempt acts under this Part. Exempt acts include: Any act, decision, or commitment required to be made within a
specific time set by Federal law, rule, regulation or set by other Federally
imposed requirement where such time limit renders EIS analysis
impossible. All maintenance and repair activities involving existing
facilities and structures. Actions necessitated by emergencies, including, but not limited
to, clean-up of flood and storm damage and accident clean-up. Approval and execution of grants or contracts for the
rehabilitation, maintenance or repair of existing facilities or structures not
involving an expansion of the facility or structure. Approval and execution of grants or contracts for the purchase
of equipment which will be used in connection with existing facilities or
structures. All ministerial acts, including those listed in Appendix 45-B
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app
45-A
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
